ema polis niladharinge lekhanaya me wanawita amathyanshayata labi athi bawath winaya parikshana nomathi ayata adala nirdesha kriyathmaka kirimata jathika polis komisamata idiriyedi yomukarana bawath jagath wijewira mahatha sandahan kaleya.

anith konata giya dosthara nodanna demala ganath, as his mola nathi pishachayin mada anith kona thaniwunu lama mawwarunge jiwitha katha ekkama indu fes buk giya gamana awasanaye rajithan aparajitha wuna hatith, ostreliyanuwan athpolasan nangaddi oya ledawanam beraganna epa kiyamin gamak aayachana kala hatiwagema methek kiyu nokiyu boho katha ee osse liyawuna.anith kona pothe kawaraye pinthuraya labuneth bohoma apuru siduwimak nisa...

me karanaya sambandhayen thindu dena atuwakarayan ha wiwechakayan adala aanduka්rama wyawasthamaya widhiwidhana ha nithiya sampurnayen wataha ganimata asamath wima ho sawadya thorathuru pathirawimen haniyak kirimata hithamatha pa්rayathna darima ho me deka ma sidu wima aththa washayen ma awasanawaki.

wiplawawadaya pawathina kramaye sampurna wenasak illanawa.ee kiyanne anda damala atharin pathara sanshodhana kihipayak karala samajaya idiriyata gena ya nohaki bawath sistam eka padanaminma mulika washayen wenas kirimakin meha samaja pragathiya dinaganima kala nohakkak bawath wiplawawadi deshapalanaya kalpana karanawa.prathisanskaranawadaya eeta wenaswa pawathina kramaya ekka sahayogayak yojana karanawa.thiyena kramaya samaga yam aakarayaka wiwechanathathmaka set wimakin pragathiya ha samaja sadharanathwaya dinaganimak kerehi prathisanskaranawadi deshapalanaya yomuwenawa.

loku iskole mahaththaya batha athulu pirisa polimata dana gaswa pol gedi tika idiriyen thaba wewal pujawa samanga honda dharma deshanayakda kale kolu rale amma muththada sihi karawamini.kenthiya ihawaha gos siti iskole mahaththaya dan ithin me tika kapiyawu kiwe tharahatamaya.waha nagisiti batha athulu pirisa waha waha pol bhukthi windina ayuru loku mahaththaya bala hitiye kata waradima gana pasuthawemin wiya yuthuya.
pilip wa eda paharagena giyane prana apakaruwek widihata makena, guwan thotupaledi.
